title: (x) Wild Wing Cafe ornate connecting script - Boulevard {David H}
content:
Can anyone ID this font. I’ve checked Bowfins’ script guide. Helpful, but unless I missed it, no dice.

Sorry, but my original jpg was cmyk, gave me errors here. Hopefully this works.

| --- | --- |

author: evan

comments.content:
Boulevard (I’m sure there’s another name…….. right now i don’t have any link)

- - - - - - - - - - - -  
Adjective5™ | Adj5™
BTW David, Berthold fonts can be found at Phil’s.

Argh! I relatively common font. I’ve seen that fonts dozens of times, but I didn’t see it. Must have been the small size.

The collective minds here make this a great forum.

Thank you.

Yves:  
Ah…sorry & thank you
